## Part 2 - Tooth Growth
```{r loadData}
data("ToothGrowth")
d <- 
  ToothGrowth %>%
  mutate(dose=as.factor(dose)) %>%
  group_by(supp, dose) %>%
  summarise(mean_length = mean(len))
```

```{r toothPlots}
g <- ggplot(d, aes(dose, mean_length))
g + facet_grid(cols=vars(supp)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", aes(fill=dose)) +
    ggtitle("Mean Tooth Growth by Treatment and Dosage") +
    xlab("Dosage") + ylab("Mean Length") + theme(legend.position="none")
```
